title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Skills: Adaptive Social Education Programs for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners apply a social issue analysis framework linked to their job environment with at least 80% accuracy
Learners participate in recommended case studies aligned with their learning preferences and propose practical applications at least three times
Learners diagnose knowledge gaps through an adaptive assessment system and complete at least two supplementary learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
